document.full_text: chrystia freeland has been named to the new position of editor of thomson reuters digital as thomson reuters corp puts more emphasis on internet and mobile applications for its consumer news products.
document.title: chrystia freeland named thomson reuters digital editor
lines_and_colors: chrystia freeland has been named to the new position of editor of thomson reuters digital as thomson reuters corp puts more emphasis on internet and mobile applications for its consumer news products.
